title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Brady, LeBron, Texans, Washington
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR 1-Brady, LeBron, Texans, Washington
description:
Doug Gottlieb filling for Colin


Tom Brady versus Chicago tonight & what he has in common with LeBron James

Deshaun Watson should be more criticized

How will the NFL deal with the Titans situation?

Why Dwayne Haskins didn't work in Washington


Guest: Didi Gregorius
